title: Understanding the Japanese
creator_credit: Japan. Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Shinichi Koike and Haruhiko Kawamura
brief_description: A round-table social commentary by foreigners living in Japan including a professor and an employee of a Japanese company from Australia; a BBC producer as well as a freelance translater from England; a professor from Canada; and a lecturer of comparative culture from America.
